name: DOTA CARDS: ARCHMAGE
description:
In battle, you will have 6 cards to destroy the enemy's Throne or rebuild your Throne! Heroes have characteristics: strength, agility and intelligence. Cost of card depends on the level of the Hero. You can improve your characteristics and hinder the enemy by taking them away!

- You can play online with other players!

- Artificial Intelligence!

- One hundred different cards!

- Foreign language support!

Language support:

—  English, Русский, Polskie, български, čeština, Française, Deutsch, Italiano, Indonesia, Melayu, Nederlands, Norsk, Filipino, Português, Español, Svenska, Türk, Tiếng Việt

— हिन्दी,  中国人, اللغة العربية, বাংলা, 한국어

(if you can help me with translate, write me: sanya.caa.f@gmail.com)
